basics.name: Nitin Nilesh
basics.summary: Camera Modelling Research Engineer - Multimedia Systems Team, Qualcomm India | Research Scholar at IIIT Hyderabad | Computer Vision | Deep Learning | Machine Learning | Machine Learning on IoT

work.name: Qualcomm Research
work.summary: At Qualcomm, my role entails overseeing the entire imaging pipeline, which spans from the initial sensor input to the production of the final image. This involves the implementation and management of crucial camera techniques like filtering, sharpening, denoising, compression, and other essential processes to enhance the overall image quality and optimize the imaging experience for end-users.
highlights: Image Signal Processor (ISP), Computational Photography, Camera Pipeline

work.name: Amazon
work.summary: 1. Worked on Graph based convolution networks (GCN, GAT) to detect fraudulence on both customer and order level.\ 2. Used attention based models on Heterogeneous Graphs across different edge types to perform node based classification.
highlights: Image Signal Processor (ISP), Computational Photography, Camera Pipeline

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
